full_summary:
### RFSA Subscription Agent Services Solicitation

**Solicitation Number**: WS3740006143
** Amendment Number**: 1
**Publication Date**: November 6, 2023
**Tender Closing Date**: November 21, 2023, at 14:00 EST ( expired)

**Award Notice Details**

* **Awarding Body**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contact Information**: Matthew Curran (SPAC/PSPC), matthew.curran@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca 

**Background**
The Government of Canada is seeking a firm to act as a Subscription Agent to provide subscription management services, data collection, and electronic resource management. The successful bidder will be responsible for acquiring, managing, and delivering subscriptions to publications, including print and online content. The agent will have access to the Electronic Resource Management Platform and provide support services as required.

**Key Information**

* **Contract Scope**: 
  * Acquisition of subscriptions to publications
  * Delivery, management, and related support of subscriptions
  * Access to the Electronic Resource Management Platform
* **Services Period**: December 8, 2023, to September 18, 2028
* **Locations**: 
  * Contracting Entity: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada
  * Field Work: Various locations in Canada

**Evaluation**
The evaluation criteria are based on a combination of the following methods:
* Request for Proposal (RFP) Open Bidding system
* Trade Agreements (Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA))

### Committee Members
This solicitation has been closed on November 21, 2023, as per the amended closing time. The notice for this solicitation is available at [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17928026?extsite=MTc5MjgwMjZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==] (https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17928026?extsite=MTc5MjgwMjZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==). Please note that the request for proposal document and supporting information may change over time; it is the responsibility of interested bidders to verify the completeness of the bundle.  This solicitation may be subject to changes, cancellations, or amendments
